root.name: Raycatcher
root.description: OverviewLoad your own music library as MP3's and rotate a cluster of colorful shapes to catch matching rays of light cast onto your screen. As you match light to shape, your cluster will expand and evolve.PC System RequirementsOS: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista (With Latest Service Pack)Processor: 2.0 GHzMemory: 1 GBGraphics: nVidia or ATI 3D Video CardHard Drive: 140 MB Free Space
